tracks.name: Beaudry through Glendale Loop 9mi
tracks.description: Mix between trail fireroads and streets back to the start. Hits the high peaks of the Verdugos.

tracks.name: Home to Top of Brown Mtn via Gould, Fern Truck, Ken Burton 18
tracks.description: Long route from home up Angeles Crest and down to Gould Campground.  From there hang a left on Gabriellino to the waterfall, ascent Fern Truck and Ken Burton to top of Brown Mtn.  Distance (mi): 17.83, Ascent (ft): 4590, Peak Ele (ft): 4470

tracks.name: Home2TeePee Typical Long 7.64mi
tracks.description: Nice Mid distance going to Foothill and up La Canada Open Space Trail to the Teepee then back down with some rollers. Distance: 7.64 miles, Ele Gain: 2268 feet

tracks.name: JPL East Lot to Top of Brown Mtn. 14.6 mi
tracks.description: To top of Brown from East Lot.  Total Distance (mi): 14.64, Total Ascent (ft): 5079

tracks.file: La Verne Peak through San Dimas 10.geojson
tracks.name: La Verne Peak through San Dimas 10
tracks.description: Lollypop from La Verne up the roads to San Dimas Fire Station, then bushwack to get on Sunset Ridge Trail without going through private property.  Then pass the beehives and up the to of ridge.  Return through steepness and back.

tracks.name: La Verne to San Dimas Fire Station - Hills 8
tracks.description: Street route from La Verne up San Dimas Fire Station and routes back.

tracks.name: La Verne to Potato Mountain via Marshall Canyon, Claremont Hills - 20 miles
tracks.description: Through Marshall Canyon route but goes further to Potato Mountain then down to the Pagoda. Distance (mi): 19.31, Ascent (ft): 2170

tracks.name: Marshall Canyon Big Loop 12
tracks.location: Claremont Hills Regional Park, Claremont, CA
tracks.description: Starts Oak Mesa Park through Marshall Canyon and loops around Claremont Hills.

tracks.name: Mochie's Short Route 2.6
tracks.description: When there isn't the typical 5 miler for her, this is a good alternative.

tracks.name: Mount Wilson via Sierra Madre, Jones Peak, and Bailey Canyon Loop 14.5
Mount Disappointment Trail Race 25k
tracks.location: San Gabriel Mountains, LA County, CA
tracks.description: Mt. Disappointment (5,963-ft) named in 1894 when surveyors thought it was the highest point, only to find nearby San Gabriel Peak was taller.

tracks.name: Mt. Disappointment Trail Race - 50k
tracks.location: San Gabriel Mountains, LA County, CA
tracks.description: Figure 8 from Wilson to Disappointment (5,963-ft) around Strawberry Peak and Lawler.

tracks.name: Mt. Wilson Occidental Disappointment Lowe and back 12
tracks.location: San Gabriel Mountains, LA County, CA

tracks.name: Palm Drive to Mt. Lukens Peak 14
tracks.description: Out and back on mostly uncovered fire road to highest point in city of LA (5075 ft)

tracks.name: Sunshine Drive to Verdugo Peak 12
tracks.description: Wide Fireroad route up the Verdugos.  Hits the peaks Verdugo Peak (~3,126 ft) — Verdugos tallest point, Tongva Peak (~2,656 ft), Mount Thom (~2440 ft).
